title: Scream
content:
Hey, didn't TMST steal that Scream painting? What happened to that site with the picture of him and the painting? Just wondering if this was a hoax or not. I'm not gonna go "tell" on anyone (the reward is WAY too low), but I was just wondering.------------------------------------
[url=http://kevan.org/brain.cgi?Q90]click here to see something interesting (PLEASE!!!!!!!!)[/url]
The NEW
[url=http://qsilver90.com][img]http://qsilver90.com/images/logos/logo1.png[/img][/url]

title: Re: Scream
content:
You have got to be kid...





Yes...
Yes it was real. -----------------------
"The Adventures of Commander Keen" issue #1: [img]http://img93.imageshack.us/img93/8904/wid1kx.png[/img]
"Fat people buy lots"

title: Re: Scream
content:
He sold it to me for some candy. If I had a webcam I could take a picture from it.-----------------
[img]http://jamba.nl/storage/view/335/0/cr/CrazyFrog___Axel_F_Rocket.gif[/img]
Jamster! rules!

title: Re: Scream
content: Yeah, of course it was TMST! Definitely not a hoax. If I had some very expensive art I'd change it for some candy as well.[url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: Re: Scream
content:
Okay, so I though it was real. I wanted that reward dammit.------------------------------------

title: Re: Scream
content: Hehe. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]  Talking about that, the painting's still missing? Well, if so then it's probably in someone's private collection.[url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: Re: Scream
content:
Yeah, lets just say I have a lot of candy... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img]

Anywayz, just go to TMST's site and look in the history at the bottom, it should still be there.A proud member of the signature stealing society

title: Re: Scream
content:

Unfortunately yes. It's one of the best paintings ever IMO.

title: Re: Scream
content:
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img] Yeah, that's what I figured out, I guessed it isn't in any public gallery. Hmmm, we're kinda far already, it won't take long till we figure out where the painting is currently located.

And yah, it's very nice.[url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]
